content: अनूचान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} or --नः [अनुवच्-कानच् निपातः <ls>P. III. 2. 109</ls>; वेदस्य अनुवचनं कृतवान् अनूचानः <ls>Sk.</ls>] {@--1@} One devoted to study, learned; especially one wellversed in the Vedas with their Aṅgas so as to be able to repeat, read and teach them; योऽनूचानः स नो महान् <ls>Ms. 2. 154</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 82</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 24</ls>; इदमूचुरनूचानाः <ls>Ku. 6. 15.</ls> {@--2@} Modest, unassuming; humble, well-behaved.
